# Visual Test Cases for D* Lite and Collision Detection
# Format: X=obstacle, .=empty, 1/2=robot starts, A/B=robot goals
# Single robot tests use 1/A, multi-robot tests use 1/2 and A/B

# ============ SINGLE ROBOT D* LITE TESTS ============

# Test 1: Simple path with no obstacles
TEST_DSTAR_SIMPLE
10x10
. . . . . . . . . .
. 1 . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . A .
. . . . . . . . . .

# Test 2: Path around vertical wall obstacle
TEST_DSTAR_VERTICAL_WALL
10x10
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . X . . . .
. . . . . X . . . .
. . 1 . . X . . A .
. . . . . X . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .

# Test 3: Navigate through a maze
TEST_DSTAR_MAZE
10x10
. . . . . . . . . .
. 1 . X . . . . . .
. . . X . . X . . .
. . . X . . X . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. X X . X X X . . .
. . . X . . . . . .
. . . X . . X . . .
. . . . . . X . A .
. . . . . . . . . .

# Test 4: No path exists (goal surrounded)
TEST_DSTAR_NO_PATH
10x10
. . . . . . . . . .
. 1 . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . X X X . . .
. . . . X A X . . .
. . . . X X X . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .

# Test 5: Dynamic obstacle test (obstacle added at runtime)
# During test, obstacle will be added at (4,1)
TEST_DSTAR_DYNAMIC
10x10
. . . . . . . . . .
. 1 . . . . . . A .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .

# ============ MULTI-ROBOT COLLISION TESTS ============

# Test 6: Same-Cell Collision - robots meet at crossing
TEST_SAME_CELL_FIXED
5x5
X X A X X
X X . X X
B . . . 2
X X . X X
X X 1 X X

# Test 7: Parallel Movement - robots move side by side (no collision)
TEST_PARALLEL_MOVEMENT
5x5
X X X X X
X . . . X
X 1 2 . X
X A B . X
X X X X X

# Test 8: Series Movement - robots move in convoy (no collision)
TEST_SERIES_MOVEMENT
5x5
X X X X X
X 1 . . X
X 2 . . X
X A . . X
X B . . X

# Test 9: Shear Collision - perpendicular crossing
# Robot1 moves down, Robot2 moves right, they cross at (2,2)
TEST_SHEAR_COLLISION
5x5
X X 1 X X
X X 2 B X
X X A X X
X X X X X
X X X X X

# Test 10: Swap Collision (narrow corridor)
# Robots must exchange positions
TEST_SWAP
4x4
X X X X
X X X X
B 1 2 A
X X X X

# Test 11: Open Grid Crossing
# Robots have straight paths that cross
TEST_OPEN_CROSSING
5x5
1 . . . A
. . . . .
. . . . .
. . . . .
B . . . 2

# Test 12: Dynamic Obstacle for multi-robot
# Add obstacle after initial path planning
TEST_MULTI_DYNAMIC
5x5
. . . . .
1 . . . A
. . . . .
B . . . 2
. . . . .

# Test 13: Complex multi-robot scenario
# This set up triggers long planning time
TEST_COMPLEX_MULTIROBOT
10x10
. . . . . . . . . .
. 1 . . . . . . 2 .
. . . . . . X . . .
. . . X . . X . . .
. . . X . . X . . .
. . . X . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. X X X X . . . . .
. B . . . X . . A .
. . . . . X . . . .

# Test 14: Robot2 pathfinding failure case
# Robot2 at (8,6) needs to reach (8,8)
TEST_ROBOT2_PATH_FAILURE
10x10
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . . . . .
. . . . . . X . . .
. . . X . . X . . .
. . . X . . X . . .
. . . X . . . . . .
. 1 . . . . . . 2 .
. X X X X . . . . .
. B . . . X . . A .
. . . . . . . . . .
